channel.title: Need Coder Badly
channel.description:
[b]Hi.
I need a very good coder that knows alot and that will actually help me with anything. I need help with the following things:
~~Adding/Removing NPC's~~ ~~Adding/Removing Spawned Items (Example Banks)~~ ~~Adding/Removing Shop Items~~ ~~Adding Shop Prices~~ ~~Adding SAFE/WILD Areas~~ ~~Adding/Removing Teleport Tabs~~ ~~Changing Areas~~ ~~Changing Combat/Skill Levels~~ ~~Removing Nulls On Client~~ If you wish to help me and be a Co Owner of my Hamachi server E-Mail or Chat to me on: My MSN ix_jaz_xi@hotmail.co.uk[/b]
[b]Also whoever will help me, I will make you Co Owner of my Hamachi Sever[/b]

item.title: Need Coder Badly

ill code for you although you will not say bad things about Us or america or however you Mexico or French people call it.

item.title: Need Coder Badly
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

Go away, what you’re saying doesn’t make sense. People voluntarily help out here anyway which you should be grateful for. Anyone that becomes your dedicated programming slave for free is even more stupid than you.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Coder Badly
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“iX_Jaz_Xi, post:1, topic:281035”][b]Hi.

I need a very good coder that knows alot and that will actually help me with anything.
I need help with the following things:

Adding/Removing NPC’s
Adding/Removing Spawned Items (Example Banks)
Adding/Removing Shop Items
Adding Shop Prices
Adding SAFE/WILD Areas
Adding/Removing Teleport Tabs
Changing Areas
Changing Combat/Skill Levels
Removing Nulls On Client
If you wish to help me and be a Co Owner of my Hamachi server E-Mail or Chat to me on:
My MSN ix_jaz_xi@hotmail.co.uk[/b]

Also whoever will help me, I will make you Co Owner of my Hamachi Sever[/quote]

I’ll code if you pay me 20$ a month.

NO. Asking for coders isn’t allowed, learn to code yourself. Although the above sentence is true

Read full topic
